(Nope.  Normally you can fire two weapons, but you can only use one weapon if 
it's explosive, like a missile or grenade)

Predator:


He leapt again, but it wasn't enough as the force of the missile's explosion 
sent him tumbling to the ground.  Scrambling to his feet quickly, Predator 
launched off a grenade at Blacknightmare's left leg, hoping it would knock 
his opponent over.
